languages.text: {n}Механизм на голове сервитора изрыгает сноп искр, и черные, окрашенные пеплом слезы чертят дорожки по бледным щекам. Слабый шепот доносится из уст сервитора:{/n} "Готов... исполнять... функцию... Слава... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Механизм на голове сервитора изрыгает сноп искр, и черные, окрашенные пеплом слезы чертят дорожки по бледным щекам. Слабый шепот доносится из уст сервитора:{/n} "Готов... исполнять... функцию... Слава... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}..."

languages.text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."
languages.original_text: {n}Механизм на голове сервитора изрыгает сноп искр, и черные, окрашенные пеплом слезы чертят дорожки по бледным щекам. Слабый шепот доносится из уст сервитора:{/n} "Готов... исполнять... функцию... Слава... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}..."

A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

languages.text: {n}Ein Funkenschauer schießt aus dem Mechanismus auf dem Kopf des Servitors, und schwarze, von Asche durchzogene Tränen hinterlassen ihre Spuren auf seinen blassen Wangen. Ein schwaches Flüstern kriecht über die Lippen des Servitors.{/n} "Bereit ... meine Funktion ... zu erfüllen ... Ruhm ... dem {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Funkenschauer schießt aus dem Mechanismus auf dem Kopf des Servitors, und schwarze, von Asche durchzogene Tränen hinterlassen ihre Spuren auf seinen blassen Wangen. Ein schwaches Flüstern kriecht über die Lippen des Servitors.{/n} "Bereit ... meine Funktion ... zu erfüllen ... Ruhm ... dem {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} ..."

languages.text: {n}Une pluie d'étincelles jaillit du mécanisme sur la tête du servitor et des larmes noires, couleur de cendres, coulent le long de ses joues blafardes. Un faible murmure parvient péniblement à franchir les lèvres du servitor.{/n} « Prêt à... exécuter... mes fonctions... Gloire à... l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}... »
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une pluie d'étincelles jaillit du mécanisme sur la tête du servitor et des larmes noires, couleur de cendres, coulent le long de ses joues blafardes. Un faible murmure parvient péniblement à franchir les lèvres du servitor.{/n} « Prêt à... exécuter... mes fonctions... Gloire à... l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}... »

languages.text: {n}机器装置中迸射出一串火花，落在机仆头上。灰黑色的泪滴在机仆苍白的脸颊上留下了长长的印痕。它颤动嘴唇，发出微弱的低语。{/n}“准备……执行……我的功能……荣耀……归于{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}……”
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}机器装置中迸射出一串火花，落在奴工头上。灰黑色的泪滴在奴工苍白的脸颊上留下了长长的印痕。它颤动嘴唇，发出微弱的低语。{/n}“准备……执行……我的功能……荣耀……归于{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}……”

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターの頭上の機械から火花がシャワーのように散り、その頬を黒く灰混じりの涙がツーッと流れる。か細い声がサーヴィターの唇からこぼれた。{/n}「機能…実行…準備完了…{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を…讃えよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターの頭上の機械から火花がシャワーのように散って、その頬を黒く灰混じりの涙がツーッと流れる。か細い声がサーヴィターの唇からこぼれた。{/n}「機能…実行…準備完了…{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を…讃えよ…」

languages.text: {n}Una lluvia de chispas estalla del mecanismo sobre la cabeza del servidor, y unas lágrimas negras y teñidas de ceniza recorren sus pálidas mejillas. Un débil susurro sale de los labios del servidor.{/n} «Listo... para cumplir... mi función... Gloria... al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}...».
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una lluvia de chispas estalla del mecanismo sobre la cabeza del servidor, y unas lágrimas negras y teñidas de ceniza recorren sus pálidas mejillas. Un débil susurro sale de los labios del servidor.{/n} «Listo... para cumplir... mi función... Gloria... al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}...»

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörün kafasındaki mekanizmadan kıvılcımlar saçılıyor ve kül tonundaki kara gözyaşları, soluk yanaklarında iz bırakarak aşağı süzülüyor. Hizmetörün dudaklarından cılız bir fısıltı dökülüyor.{/n} "Vazifemi... İcra etmeye... Hazırım... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}... Çok yaşa..."
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the mechanism upon the servitor's head, and black, ash-tinted tears make tracks down its pale cheeks. A weak whisper comes from the servitor's lips.{/n} "Ready... to perform... my function... Glory... to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekanizmadan çıkan kıvılcım yağmuru, servitörün başından aşağı dökülüyor. Siyah ve kül rengindeki gözyaşları, soluk yanaklarında iz bırakarak süzülüyor. Servitörün ağzından sessiz bir fısıltı çıkıyor.{/n} "Vazifemi yerine getirmeye hazırım... {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} çok yaşa..."
